languages.text: {n}В визорах Гапрак что-то дробно щелкает.{/n} "Отрадно было видеть, что вы поставили подле себя одного из священнослужителей Омниссии. В это трудное время всему сектору необходимо сплотиться и обратиться в единый механизм. Адептус Механикус помогут нам сделать это".

traits.locale_text: {n}В визорах Гапрак что-то дробно щелкает.{/n} "Отрадно было видеть, что вы поставили подле себя одного из священнослужителей Омниссии. В это трудное время всему сектору необходимо сплотиться и обратиться в единый механизм. Адептус Механикус помогут нам сделать это".

languages.text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."
languages.original_text: {n}В визорах Гапрак что-то дробно щелкает.{/n} "Отрадно было видеть, что вы поставили подле себя одного из священнослужителей Омниссии. В это трудное время всему сектору необходимо сплотиться и обратиться в единый механизм. Адептус Механикус помогут нам сделать это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, all of the sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

{n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, all of the sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

{n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

{n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

{n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

languages.text: {n}トリアーナの機械面でカタカタと音が鳴る。{/n}「陛下のお側におられます、万機神の司祭のおひとりとお会いできて嬉しく思います。この困難な時期においては、全星域が一致団結し、ひとつの構造に統合されるべきです。帝国技術局はまさにその力となりましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナの機械面でカタカタと音が鳴る。{/n}「陛下のお側におられます、万機神の司祭のおひとりとお会いできて嬉しく思います。この困難な時期においては、全星域が一致団結し、ひとつの構造に統合されるべきです。帝国技術局はまさにその力となりましょう」

languages.text: {n}她的面甲里发出了咔哒声。{/n}“我很高兴欧姆尼塞亚的神甫与您同行。在这样的艰难时刻，整个科罗努斯扩区都需要团结一心，成为一台统一的巨型机器。机械修会可以帮助我们实现这个目标。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的面甲里发出了咔哒声。{/n}“我很高兴欧姆尼塞亚的祭司与您同行。在这样的艰难时刻，整个科罗努斯扩区都需要团结一心，成为一台统一的巨型机器。机械修会可以帮助我们实现这个目标。”

languages.text: {n}Algo traquetea en sus visores.{/n} «Me hacía ilusión ver a uno de los sacerdotes del Omnissiah a su lado. En estos tiempos tan convulsos, todo el sector debe estar unido como un solo mecanismo. El Adeptus Mechanicus nos ayudará precisamente a ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo traquetea en sus visores.{/n} «Me hacía ilusión ver a uno de los sacerdotes del Omnissiah a su lado. En estos tiempos tan convulsos, todo el sector debe estar unido como un solo mecanismo. El Adeptus Mechanicus nos ayudará precisamente a ello».

languages.text: {n}Un étrange bruit de ferraille vous parvient de ses visières.{/n} « J'ai été ravie de voir l'un des prêtres de l'Omnimessie à vos côtés. Nous traversons une période difficile, il est donc essentiel que tout le secteur oppose un front uni face à l'adversité, tel un unique mécanisme. Et nous ne pourrons y parvenir sans l'aide de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un étrange bruit de ferraille vous parvient de ses visières.{/n} « J'ai été ravie de voir l'un des prêtres de l'Omnimessie à vos côtés. Nous traversons une période difficile, il est donc essentiel que tout le secteur oppose un front uni face à l'adversité, tel un unique mécanisme. Et nous ne pourrons y parvenir sans l'aide de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »

languages.text: {n}Etwas rattert in ihren Visoren.{/n} "Ich war erfreut, einen Priester des Omnissiah neben Euch zu sehen. In diesen schweren Zeiten muss der gesamte Sektor zusammenstehen, zu einem Mechanismus vereint. Der Adeptus Mechanicus wird uns helfen, das zu bewerkstelligen."
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas rattert in ihren Visoren.{/n} "Ich war erfreut, einen Priester des Omnissiah neben Euch zu sehen. In diesen schweren Zeiten muss der gesamte Sektor zusammenstehen, zu einem Mechanismus vereint. Der Adeptus Mechanicus wird uns helfen, das zu bewerkstelligen."

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın vizöründe bir şeyler tıngırdıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in rahiplerinden birini yanınızda görünce keyiflendim. Bu zor günlerde tüm sektör olarak tek yürek olmamız, tek bir mekanizma hâlinde hareket etmemiz lazım. Adeptus Mechanicus da bunu yapmamıza yardımcı olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Something rattles in her visors.{/n} "I was delighted to see one of the Omnissiah's priests placed beside you. In these trying times, the entire sector needs to stand together, united into one mechanism. The Adeptus Mechanicus will help us do just that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana'nın vizöründe bir şeyler tıngırdıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in rahiplerinden birini yanınızda görünce keyiflendim. Bu zor günlerde tüm sektör olarak tek yürek olmamız, tek bir mekanizma hâlinde hareket etmemiz lazım. Adeptus Mechanicus da bunu yapmamıza yardımcı olacak."
